dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Yes. Lilia wake up! Come on! Wake up Lilia!

dialogs.name: ALMA
dialogs.sentenses: I think I'm starting to remember...

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Remember what? This is no time for this, we need to wake up my sister and get out of here before he comes back.

dialogs.name: ALMA
dialogs.sentenses: It's still something vague like a dream... A distant memory...

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Damn, I can't see anything in this dark. Alma, look for some source of light, a match… You must know what a match is… Come on Alma, help me, we have to get out of here.

dialogs.name: ALMA
dialogs.sentenses: Like a distant past, almost as if it were another life...

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: That noise. That guy. You with this weird chat. I just wanted to get out of here. Lilia wake up! Somebody help me!

dialogs.name: ALMA
dialogs.sentenses: I help you sister! I know how to get out of here!
